Hero.title: NextKit
Hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Starter
Hero.description: Skip the setup, start building. A production-ready Next.js starter kit with everything you need to ship your next project faster than ever.

Features.heading: Everything you need to build amazing apps
Features.subheading: Carefully crafted components and tools that make development a joy

nextGenStack.title: Next-Gen Stack
nextGenStack.description: Powered by Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS — built for speed, scalability, and developer happiness.

advancedAuth.title: Advanced Auth System
advancedAuth.description: Modern auth with Better Auth, session persistence, Google OAuth, and multi-provider account linking.

builtInSubscriptions.title: Built-in Subscriptions
builtInSubscriptions.description: Seamless billing with Polar.sh, multi-tier pricing, webhook handling, and self-service customer portal.

web3Ready.title: Web3 Ready
web3Ready.description: Seamlessly integrate crypto wallets, smart contract interactions, and token-gated features into your app.

aiReadyDashboard.title: AI-Ready Dashboard
aiReadyDashboard.description: Integrated OpenAI chatbot with Markdown rendering and conversational UI—ready to boost user engagement.

beautifulUI.title: Beautiful UI Components
beautifulUI.description: Accessible components with shadcn/ui and Radix UI. Dark/light themes, animations, and responsive design.

typeSafeBackend.title: Type-Safe Backend
typeSafeBackend.description: Drizzle ORM, Neon Postgres, and Cloudflare R2 for scalable, zero-egress storage and schema-safe queries.

i18nReady.title: Internationalization Ready
i18nReady.description: next-intl powered localization with RTL support and dynamic locale switching.

productionGrade.title: Production-Grade Setup
productionGrade.description: Includes ESLint, Prettier, Docker, TypeScript strict mode, and Git hooks with lint-staged pre-commit checks.

Testimonials.heading: Loved by developers worldwide
Testimonials.subheading: Join thousands of developers who trust NextKit

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: This starter kit saved me weeks of setup time. The code quality is exceptional!

testimonials.name: Ahmed Kan
testimonials.content: Perfect RTL support and i18n implementation. Exactly what we needed for our global app.

testimonials.name: Maria Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The attention to detail in the UI components is outstanding. Our team loves it!

CTA.heading: Ready to build something amazing?
CTA.subheading: Get started with NextKit today and ship your next project in record time.

CodePreview.heading: Clean, Modern Code
CodePreview.subheading: Built with best practices and modern patterns

Footer.description: Production-ready Next.js starter kit with modern tooling and best practices.
